name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add rum and top with soda. Stir well and garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar with bitters and water. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Garnish with an orange slice and cocktail cherry.

name: Margarita
instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with lime slice to make the salt stick. Take a chilled glass, dip in salt. Combine tequila, triple sec, and lime juice and pour into the glass. Serve over ice and garnish with lime.

name: Martini
instructions: Combine gin and vermouth, pour into a mixing glass with ice cubes, stir well. Strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive or a twist of lemon peel.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Shake vodka, triple sec, lime and cranberry juice vigorously in a shaker with ice. Strain into a martini glass, garnish with a lime wedge on the rim, and serve.

name: Pina Colada
instructions: Blend rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice with one cup of crushed ice. Serve in a chilled glass garnished with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Stir together vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, salt, and pepper. Serve over ice in a large, tall glass.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and garnish with a lime wheel.
